p: Twenty seven chemical components were identified for the first time in SW; PWE. Benzcatechin (1.14%), 1-Methoxy-7-methyl-3,4-dihydrobenzo[c]pyran (1.31%), (+)-(1S,3R,4S)-4(a)-Methyladamantane (2.14%), 1-(2â€²-hydroxyphenyl)prop-2-en-1-ol (0.71%), 1,3,5-benzenetriol (1.11%), 4-propyl-1,2-Benzenediol (1.615%), 3,4,5-trimethoxyphenol (0.54%), 4-((1E)-3-Hydroxy-1-propenyl)-2-methoxyphenol (1.00%), and Vanillylmandelic acid (0.78%) were present only in PWE of SW. These compounds and 4-Allyl-2,6-dimethoxyphenol were detected for the first time in any Cinnamon accessions ( Table 3).
